version_description:
• New features: Photo Album and Memory. All available on iOs 14 Widget Home Screen.
Now you can see memory photos from an event in Days or Months right on your home screen.
• Tutorial for Photo Widget: How to use the app and How to add widgets to home screen.
Do you love the app? Let us know in the reviews! We read them all.

Performance Improvements.
Do you love the app? Let us know in the reviews! We read them all.
